elements.name: aboutCompanionText
elements.html:
Before we begin, this survey asks questions about your experience with LarPar and how it affected your companion. We know how hard it is to lose a beloved companion. If you're still grieving from the loss, maybe it's best to do the survey later when you've had time to heal.

If you think you're ready to continue, please let us know if your companion is still with you or has crossed over the Rainbow Bridge. This will determine what questions we will ask in the survey.
